name: People is food
description:
People is food is a simple top down puzzle like game with 5 levels, this is only the second game I made so don't expect allot, hope you enjoy :)

5/14/2020 Update:

fixed:

1.lazer boxes killing the player even after the lazer is switched off.

2.the box thing under the spikes killing the player even tho it's not really an obstacle.

Added:

1.click sound when the player entractes with the lazer switches.

2.level select menu.
